Journal Story: Spent a great weekend with Nephew Carson doing a 3 day, two night 25 mile shakedown hike along Suwannee River.  Beautiful Trail...definitely worth going back.  Most of the trail was along the river bluffs with great campsites.  The Florida Trail Assoc. chapter in this area does a great job maintaining the trail.
Circle B Nature Preserve in Polk County has great trails and incredible wildlife.  Great place to train for a hike and get inspired.

spent a gorgeous day doing a training hike at Tiger Creek Preserve near Lake Wales in Central Florida.  This 7.5 mile loop has some decent elevation change...for Florida!  Nice to have the balmy weather...Feeling a little guilty with the rest of the nation recently digging out of blizzard conditions.
